response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us at $1,500,000, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Given its significance to you, we believe it could be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exceptional deal, considering its market value and the benefits it offers. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
